i saw ts on there yesterday

hey! it's Mark Zukerberg, I wanted to know whether you would like to pursue your career with us.   
We are a big family spanning over various countries and are willing to make you part of it.  
We will be paying you 69 LPA CTC along with other benefits.  
Please reply for confirming for this role.















/s   
best of luck anyways man.

Hey Mark, 
I wanted to inform you that I have been in discussions with Sundar Pichai and he is offering me 420 LPA + esops worth 6.9 crores vested over 6 months, If you could match the offer we could have further discussion
